member.name: T:PusherServer.IPusher
member.summary: Provides access to functionality within the Pusher service such as to trigger events and authenticating subscription requests to private and presence channels.

member.name: P:PusherServer.IPusherOptions.RestClient
member.summary: Gets or sets the rest client. Generally only expected to be used for testing.

member.name: P:PusherServer.IPusherOptions.Encrypted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether calls to the Pusher REST API are over HTTP or HTTPS.

member.name: P:PusherServer.IPusherOptions.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the REST API port that the HTTP calls will be made to.

member.name: T:PusherServer.ITriggerOptions
member.summary: Additional options that can be used when triggering an event.

member.name: T:PusherServer.PresenceChannelData
member.summary: Information about a user who is subscribing to a presence channel.

member.name: P:PusherServer.PresenceChannelData.user_id
member.summary: A unique user identifier for the user witin the application.
member.remarks: Pusher uses this to uniquely identify a user. So, if multiple users are given the same user_id the second of these users will be ignored and won't be represented on the presence channel.

member.name: P:PusherServer.PresenceChannelData.user_info
member.summary: Arbitrary additional information about the user.
